page.topic: Creating and Using an Email Smart Field
page.description: Email0 is an Alpha Anywhere Email Smart Field. It provides a convenient method of inputting, editing, and using an email address. Email0 combines a Type-In control and a button. Clicking the 'moving letter' button displays the Send Email dialog box and copies the contents of Email0 the To field of the new email message in the Alpha Anywhere internal email client.

section.title: Smart Fields
section.description: There are several different types of Smart Fields, which add special capabilities to type-in boxes.

case.title: Calculator
case.description: Opens a calculator and sets the initial value using the contents of the smart field. Returns the value produced by clicking the equals "=" key.

case.title: Calendar
case.description: Opens a calendar to the current month with the current date selected. Returns the date selection to the smart field.

case.title: Email
case.description: Opens your default email client, such Express, Outlook or Eudora and places the smart field's content into the TO: field of the new email.

case.title: Email - Alpha Anywhere
case.description: Opens your internal Alpha Anywhere email client and places the smart field's content into the TO: field of the new email.

case.title: ExpressionÂ Builder
case.description: Opens the Expression Builder dialog box and returns the resulting expression to the smart field.

case.title: Field Select
case.description: Opens the Field Select dialog box and returns your field name selection to the smart field.

case.title: File Select
case.description: Opens the File Select dialog box and returns your file name selection to the smart field.

case.title: Order Builder
case.description: Opens the Order Builder dialog box and returns the order expression to the smart field.

case.title: Path
case.description: Opens the Enter Path dialog box and returns the folder path to the smart field.

case.title: Spin
case.description: Increases or decreases the integer number in the smart field.

case.title: URL
case.description: Launches Internet Explorer and attempts to open the URL specified by the contents of the smart field.

section.title: Procedure: Configuring the Email0 Smart Field
section.description: The following procedure assumes that the developer has opened the form in the Form Editor .Follow these instructions to create an Email box similar to Email0 :

step.description: Place a Type-In control on the form.
Right click the control and select Properties....
In the Field list select the appropriate field in your table or variable on your form. In this case the user selection is stored into the Email field of the Customer table.
Select "Email - Alpha Anywhere" in the Field-Type list.
Click the OK button to return to the Form Editor.
